Health
Health Regen
Defense Absolute
Land Mines
Wall Health
Orb Size
Health
Health enhancement is unlocked for free after completing the Workshop Enhancement Labs. Increases Health by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum of 400 levels for a multiplier of x5.00.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins
1
1.01x
5.00B

Health Regen
Requires 50 billion coins to be spent on defense enhancements to unlock. Increases the health regen multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins
1
1.01x

Defense Absolute
Requires 500 billion coins to be spent on defense enhancements to unlock. Increases the Defense Absolute multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.

Coins
Expand

Land Mine Damage
Requires 5 trillion coins to be spent on defense enhancements to unlock. Increases Land Mine Damage multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.06x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 25x bonus.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins

Wall Health
Requires 50 trillion coins to be spent on defense enhancements to unlock. Increases Wall Health by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.

Orb Size
Requires 500 trillion coins to be spent on defense enhancements to unlock. Increases Orb Size by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 200 for 3x orb size.
